sentences.sContent: We need more leisureliness and confidence.
sentences.sCn: 我们需要的是多一份从容，多一点自信。

sentences.sContent: The young butterfly flies earnestly. In the quiet leisureliness returns some broad - minded selfhood.
sentences.sContent_eng: The young butterfly flies earnestly. In the quiet leisureliness returns some broad - minded selfhood.
sentences.sCn: 幼蝶认真地飞着， 安静里的从容中又回归了几分豁达的自我。

sentences.sContent: Koreas uncle aunt of the thin film still for Han Weisong owe a maverick, usury and hanwei enterprise Matsumoto people freely leisureliness and his girlfriend at a casino to play.
sentences.sContent_eng: Koreas uncle aunt of the thin film still for Han Weisong owe a maverick, usury and hanwei enterprise Matsumoto people freely leisureliness and his girlfriend at a casino to play.
sentences.sCn: 韩疏影的叔叔婶婶依然在为韩伟松欠下的高利贷四处奔波，而韩伟松本人却悠然自在地和自己的女朋友在赌场玩乐。
